Streamlyne Platform



We collect and analyze raw unstructured data from three separate silos:

  • Asset Management Systems (IBM Maximo, SAP, Oracle)
  • Distributed Control Systems (Invensys, Honeywell, Siemens, ABB)
  • Operator generated content and data

We then take this complex data and run it through Streamlyne’s custom analytics platform and generate simple and user-friendly preventative alerts and predictive analytics for operators and managers to make better decisions. Streamlyne builds relationships between assets, sensors, and new operator-generated input so you can track what is going on, when it's going on, and why.


Manager Capabilities

Managers and VP's can view critical information for one or multi-site plants from their office or home to stay up to date on their operations.


Operator Capabilities

Operators recieve critical alerts on a mobile and application to help them identify fix issues before plant downtime or potential equipment failures occur.



API/Custom Integration

We easily connect to all major Distributed Control Systems (DCS) and Asset Management System API’s.

Distributed Control Systems

  • Invensys
  • Honeywell
  • Siemens
  • ABB

Asset Management Systems

  • IBM Maximo
